Name: Fidget Spinner In Space
About the game: Once John twisted his spinner so hard that it flew very far away - into outer space. The spinner flew, admired the cosmos and planets, did not touch anyone, but, unexpectedly, asteroids and the UFO police jumped out of nowhere. The spinner realized that the terror has come and decided to leave quickly. Fly for a spinner in space, avoid asteroids and the UFO police, and collect heads of aliens flying in space. Key features: -Play as spinner -Several types of playable spinners -Several game locations -Good soundtrack - Steam achievements
